The Cosmodrome

The Devils’ Lair

  • Champions: Overload Barrier
  • Shields: Arc Solar Void

Summary

Relatively easy, though long. High enemy density.

Nightfall Info

Champions

  • Overload: Fallen Captains.
  • Barrier: Barrier Knights and Servitors.

Shields

  • Arc: Arc Knights.
  • Solar: Solar Wizards.
  • Void: Void Servitors in the boss room.
